description:
Add a layer of warmth on cold days when you risk an unexpected dip. This one-piece thermal base layer fits under wet suits, providing next-to-skin insulation without the bulk or bunching of separate tops and bottoms.

  • Nylon and polyester blend with spandex for stretch, is breathable and moisture wicking
  • Half-zip entry is easy to get on and off
  • Drop seat for when nature calls
  • Flatlock seams throughout for chafe-free wear
name: Level Six Vesta Unisuit Drysuit Liner - Women's
